item.title: [508] File Manager Substring [508]
item.dc:creator: @sethscape508 sethscape508
item.description:
@sethscape508 wrote:

hello, i run a 508 server… its base is originally bulby… i need help with saving a quest to a certain substring… here is what im trying to save…

            } else if (line.startsWith("RuneMysteries:")) {
                p.RuneMysteries = Integer.parseInt(line.substring(20));

what substring shall i save it too? i tried so many substrings but none of them work, i run the server and it keeps on reseting me (everybody) due to the substring… is that any specific substring i must use? i used 3 random substrings for my first 3 quests ive created, i need 1 more for my 4th quest… this one is difficult cause no other substring works. please anyone help me.

Read full topic
